cyclone.name: DORIAN
cyclone.current_location: about 160 mi southeast of Nantucket, Massachusetts
cyclone.trajectory: racing northeast toward Nova Scotia and Newfoundland, remaining well offshore of the Mid-Atlantic and New England coast
cyclone.expected_landfall_location: Nova Scotia, Canada (near or just west of Halifax)

weather_observation.watch_coast: Hurricane Watch for Prince Edward Island and Magdalen Islands; no watches south of Maine
weather_observation.warning_coast: Hurricane Warning eastern Nova Scotia to western Newfoundland; Tropical Storm Warning Woods Hole MA to Eastport ME
weather_observation.impacted_coast: Southeastern Massachusetts, Downeast Maine, Atlantic Canada; large swells along the entire U.S. Mid-Atlantic and New England shoreline
weather_observation.wind: Low chance (<5%) of sustained tropical-storm-force winds; occasional gusts 20–30 mph possible as the storm passes far offshore.
weather_observation.storm_surge: No significant surge expected in New York Harbor; only elevated surf and long-period swells.
weather_observation.rainfall: Light rain bands possible; total generally <1 inch.
weather_observation.other_hazards: Dangerous rip currents and high surf impacting approaches to New York/New Jersey entrance channels.
